rules.description: Ctrl+Tab toggles Finder view mode between List and Column

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Finder"' -e 'set currentView to current view of front window' -e 'if currentView is list view then' -e 'set current view of front window to column view' -e 'else' -e 'set current view of front window to list view' -e 'end if' -e 'end tell'

rules.description: Shift+F6 renames item in Finder by sending Return key
Remap Enter to Cmd+O only in Finder file windows
CMD+Q closes Finder window and switches to previous app

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to close front window' -e 'tell application "System Events" to key code 48 using command down'

rules.description: CMD+Space in Finder switches focus to Safari and re-triggers CMD+Space after delay

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Safari" to activate' -e 'delay 0.2' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke space using command down'
